fields.description:
When a project is created using ti create <options> --workspace-dir "/path/to/workspace", it creates the project files under /path/to/workspace/project.

However, if the user want to create the project under a custom location (/path/to/myProject), then CLI still creates project files under /path/to/myProject/projectName.

Add an additional option (like --project-dir) in 'create' command to allow the project files to be created under user specified location.
fields.summary: Add an option to allow creating projects in workspace dir

comments.body: We are not introducing a {{\-\-project\-dir}} option to {{ti create}}. The correct way to do this is {{\-\-workspace\-dir}} and {{\-\-name}}.
Closing ticket as Won't Fix with reference to the above comments.
